FuncDef: The display service-mode forwarding-mode command displays the current forwarding mode of a device and the forwarding mode to be used after the next startup.
Examples: Current startup forwarding-mode of the device: compatible
Next startup forwarding-mode of the device: compatible
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
Run the command to display the current forwarding mode and the forwarding mode after the device restarts.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
